title: Little Drummer Boy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Play your drum for another player
Attributes:
- The sounds of your drum will heal your target, giving them invincible defense.
- A drummer without an audience is nothing more than a person. As such, you cannot target yourself.

desc:
Post 4035
*Shall I play for you, pa rum pum pum pum...*
